gc01.cw.robf.utility

Class FileXmlHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • gc01.cw.robf.utility.FileXmlHandler

  • public class FileXmlHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for working with XML files for OrderModel, UserModel and MenuItemModel items. Defines functions to save and load respective XML data file for each type.

    Working with XML adapted from https://www.tutorialspoint.com/java_xml/java_dom_create_document.htm

    Version:
    1.0.0
    Author:
    Rob Farthing

      FileXmlHandler()

      static void loadMenuItems(java.lang.String filePath, boolean overwrite)
      Static method which parses the specified XML file and loads the stored nodes as MenuItemModel objects.
      static void loadOrders(java.lang.String filePath, boolean overwrite)
      Static method which parses the specified XML file and loads the stored nodes as OrderModel objects.
      static void loadUsers(java.lang.String filePath, boolean overwrite)
      Static method which parses the specified XML file and loads the stored nodes as UserModel objects.
      static void saveMenuItems(java.lang.String filePath, javafx.collections.ObservableList<MenuItemModel> menuItemList)
      Static method for taking list of MenuItemModel objects and saving to specified XML file.

      Static method for taking list of OrderModel objects and saving to specified XML file.
      static void saveUsers(java.lang.String filePath, javafx.collections.ObservableList<UserModel> userList)

      • FileXmlHandler

        public FileXmlHandler()

    • Method Detail

      • loadUsers

        public static void loadUsers(java.lang.String filePath,
                             boolean overwrite)
        Static method which parses the specified XML file and loads the stored nodes as UserModel objects. Loaded file requires structure created by saveUsers method.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path of the XML file
        overwrite - Specifies whether loaded users should overwrite current users in memory or append only.

      • saveUsers

        public static void saveUsers(java.lang.String filePath,
                             javafx.collections.ObservableList<UserModel> userList)
        Static method for taking list of UserModel objects and saving to specified XML file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path of the XML file
        userList - ObservableList of UserModel objects to save.

      • loadOrders

        public static void loadOrders(java.lang.String filePath,
                              boolean overwrite)
        Static method which parses the specified XML file and loads the stored nodes as OrderModel objects. Loaded file requires structure created by saveOrders method. Uses name of menu items contained within orders to lookup MenuItemModel objects. This requires that a MenuItemObject exists for such orders.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path of the XML file
        overwrite - Specifies whether loaded orders should overwrite current orders in memory or append only.

      • saveOrders

        public static void saveOrders(java.lang.String filePath,
                              javafx.collections.ObservableList<OrderModel> orderList)
        Static method for taking list of OrderModel objects and saving to specified XML file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path of the XML file
        orderList - ObservableList of OrderModel objects to save.

      • loadMenuItems

        public static void loadMenuItems(java.lang.String filePath,
                                 boolean overwrite)
        Static method which parses the specified XML file and loads the stored nodes as MenuItemModel objects. Loaded file requires structure created by saveMenuItems method.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path of the XML file
        overwrite - Specifies whether loaded menu items should overwrite current menu items in memory or append only.

      • saveMenuItems

        public static void saveMenuItems(java.lang.String filePath,
                                 javafx.collections.ObservableList<MenuItemModel> menuItemList)
        Static method for taking list of MenuItemModel objects and saving to specified XML file.
        Parameters:
        filePath - Path of the XML file
        menuItemList - ObservableList of MenuItemModel objects to save.
